name: Bullets Unlimited: Survival Hell
description:
Some things just can't be overcome. Even with a powerful array of weapons, these hardened mercenaries will just keep coming, and some won't even die.

There's only one thing left to do.

Survive.

====================

This side-scrolling shooter is anything but easy. Your weapons aren't tools of mass destruction, and your movements are severely limited. Can you survive all 8 levels?

This game was made as a submission to the Constraints Jam. The following constraints are adhered to:

  1. Game build must be 5MB or less.
  2. Game must have 30 second levels.
  3. Game must not have a tutorial.
  4. Character can only move along a single axis.
  5. Player has only one life.

Game has been updated to tweak the final boss.
